criteria.name: Health endpoints
criteria.description: Kubernetes-compatible health, readiness, and liveness endpoints

criteria.name: Environment configuration
criteria.description: Environment variables, CLI flags, sane defaults, schema validation

criteria.name: Secrets management
criteria.description: Never hardcoded in code or logs, proper secret management

criteria.name: Network timeouts
criteria.description: No indefinite hangs, configurable timeouts

criteria.name: Retry logic
criteria.description: Exponential backoff, failure isolation

criteria.name: Idempotency
criteria.description: Safe retry mechanisms, idempotency keys

criteria.name: Structured logging
criteria.description: Request IDs, user/session IDs, brAInwav branding in logs

criteria.name: Metrics collection
criteria.description: Key counters, gauges, histograms; RED/USE methodology

criteria.name: Distributed tracing
criteria.description: Spans around I/O and business operations

criteria.name: Monitoring setup
criteria.description: Actionable alerts, SLO-based monitoring

criteria.name: Graceful shutdown
criteria.description: SIGTERM handling, connection draining

criteria.name: Resource monitoring
criteria.description: Memory/CPU monitoring, OOM protection, resource quotas

criteria.name: Migration testing
criteria.description: Both forward and rollback scenarios validated

criteria.name: Deployment strategy
criteria.description: Documented and scriptable deployment strategies

criteria.name: SBOM and signatures
criteria.description: Software Bill of Materials, artifact signing, supply chain security

criteria.name: Fault injection
criteria.description: Timeout testing, 5xx responses, partial failure scenarios

criteria.name: Environment parity
criteria.description: Production-like staging, ephemeral environments for PRs

criteria.name: Operational runbooks
criteria.description: Oncall procedures, incident playbooks, paging policies

criteria.name: Data privacy
criteria.description: PII handling, retention policies, GDPR compliance

criteria.name: Dependency audit
criteria.description: Clean vulnerability scans, update policies defined
